definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: smelt, refine, test (NH id.; Ph. [[מחרף]] smelter; As. ṣurrupu, refined, ṣarpu, silver, naṣraptu, crucible; Ar. s.irf is pure, unmixed (esp. of wine); very doubtful is Sab. [[חרף]] silver, money, cf. Mordtm:Him. Inschr. pp. 14, 29 CIS:iv, No. 291, 1.1);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ח]] Je 6:29, sf. [[חְרָפָָתְהוּ]] Ps 105:19; 2 ms. sf. [[חְרַפְתָּנִי]] Ps 17:3, etc.; Impf. 1 s. [[אֶחְרׂף]] Is 1:25, sf. [[אֶחְרְפֶנּוּ]] Ju Jdg 7:4; Imv. ms. [[חרופה]] Ps 26:2 Kt, [[חָרְפָה]] Qr; Inf. abs. [[חָרוֹף]] Je 6:29; cstr. [[לִחְרוֹף]] Da 11:35, etc.; Pt. act. sf. [[חוֹרְכָּם]] Je 9:6, etc.; pass. [[חָרוּף]] Ps 12:7, etc.;—

smelt, refine: Je 6:29, Je 6:29 in vain hath he smelted continually (inf. abs.; fig. of purifying people); so smelt away Is 1:25 (acc. of dross; fig.); of silver Zec 13:9, Ps 66:10, [[כֶּסֶף חָרוּף]] [[בַּעֲלִיל]] Ps 12:7 (all sim.); of ´[[אִמְרַת י]] Ps 18:31 = 2Sa 22:31, Ps 119:140, Pr 30:5 ([[אִמְרַת אֱלוֹהַּ]]); refine (men, by trials) Da 11:35 (+ [[לִבָרֵר]], [[לַלְבֵּן]]).

test Ju Jdg 7:4 I will test them (the warriors) for thee (´[[י]] subj.);—perh. also v:Jdg 7:3 (v. I. [[חפר]]); more gen., of ´[[י]]'s testing, trying (the hearts of) men (oft. ‖[[בָּחַן]]) Je 9:6, Is 48:10, Zec 13:9, Ps 26:2, Ps 66:10.
test (and prove true) a man (subj. ´[[י]]'s saying) Ps 105:19.

definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: smelter, refiner, hence = goldsmith Ju Jdg 17:4, Je 10:9, Je 10:14, Je 51:17, Is 40:19, Is 40:19 (but perhaps del. v:b, cf. Du Che Marti), Is 41:7, Is 46:6, Pr 25:4; as a guild Ne 3:8, Ne 3:32.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִצָּֽרְפוּ]] Da 12:10 many shall be refined (by suffering; + [[יִתְבָּֽרְרוּ]], [[יִתְלַבְּנוּ]]).
